DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess efficacy artesuante + amodiaquine four year introduction first line treatment uncomplicated childhood malaria Zanzibar . The hypothesis treatment polymerase chain reaction ( PCR ) adjust parasitological cure rate least 85 % 42 day treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Artesunate + Amodiaquine Four Years After Its Introduction Zanzibar
